Portfolio Details

  2. Portfolio Details

Project information

  • Category: Online Concert Ticketing Platform
  • Client: CTC
  • Project date: 12/3/2022

Project Description

Provides music enthusiasts with unparalleled convenience and real-time access to ticket availability, liberating them from the constraints of physical ticketing. With 'CTC,' fans can secure their coveted tickets anytime and anywhere, ensuring they never miss out on their favorite shows. Furthermore, system offers a host of essential services beyond ticket purchases. Users can effortlessly check seat availability, review their purchase history, and complete payments in mere minutes, all from the comfort of their devices.
